translation.src: <extra_id_0> M: answer <extra_id_1> U: at </s> It 's difficult <extra_id_0> <extra_id_1> the question " what are you going to do in the future ? " if the only one who has to know it is in two minds .
translation.tgt: It 's difficult to answer the question " what are you going to do in the future ? " if the only one who has to know it is in two minds .
